page.title: 05A SCHOOLCHILDS DAY IN 1985
page.content: A Schoolchild's day in 1985 I get up at 5.00am.I get dressed i have my breakfast of eggs and bacon and then i go to school.At school we read and then we do our news writing and then some maths.We then go outto play until the whistle blows.Next we do English.At lunchtime i go to the ccanten to have my dinner,I buy my pudding after and then Igo out for a long play .In the arfternoon we have art ,I made a gargoyie out of cley.We have another short play and then our teacher reads us a story and we go home.I travel five miles home on the Whittington and Brookville bus.When I get home I play with my friends until tea-time.I read or watch television before I go to bed.
